thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Hélène Filion
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Hélène Filion

author: Hélène Filion
title: Hélène Filion
text:
I've been looking at this site for over a year now and was never sure if i should order. The prices seems impossibly low and I was afraid that the items would not look like the ones on the website. I finally ordered a few suits and I am SO happy that I did. The size charts were very true to size, everything fit super well and one of the suits was even reversible! I was especially impressed with the quality. I took them all on my trip and received many compliments :)
Tips: if its your first time ordering and you dont fit within all 3 measurements (bust, hip, waist), my suggestion would be to get something that is adjustable: or example a swimsuit that has a x-back that you can tighten or loosen, or a wrap dress that waist is adjustable. I have bought some swimsuits from other sites for 150$ and to be honest, the ones from Sammy Dress were almost identical with the same quality. Will be ordering more :)
